text: This is a list of songs that originated in movies that charted (Top 40) in either the United States or the United Kingdom, though frequently the version that charted is not the one found in the film. Songs are all sourced from Whitburn, Joel The Billboard Book of Top 40 Hits, Billboard Books, New York, 1992, Whitburn, Joel, Top Pop Records 1940-1955, Record Research, Menomonee Falls Wisconsin 1973 and, Brown, Tony, Jon Kutner & Neil Warwick, The Complete Book of the British Charts: Singles and Albums, Omnibus Press, London, 2002 Brown, Tony, Jon Kutner & Neil Warwick, The Complete Book of the British Charts: Singles and Albums, Omnibus Press, London, 2002.
